cardsPage.subtitle: Explore the complete deck of Luna Fantasy - the strategic card game of the Luna universe. Filter by rarity and build your strategy.
cardsPage.whatDesc: Luna Fantasy is the official card game of the Luna universe. Created for the Luna Discord roleplay community, it combines strategy with the rich lore of our world.
cardsPage.howDesc: Luna Fantasy is a unique card game invented by us. Each player holds 5 cards. You must predict your opponent's moves. It's about strategy, not luck.

rules.rule1: Each player holds 5 cards (Common, Rare, Epic, Unique + 1 Random).
rules.rule2: The winner is usually the stronger card, but higher tier doesn't always guarantee a win blindly.
rules.rule3: A player must win 5 rounds to be the victor.
rules.rule4: You can use the Random Card as a substitute for any of your existing cards.

storyPage.title: The Chronicles
storyPage.desc: The official lore, timeline, and the beginning of the Great Chaos War.

chapter1.label: Chapter One
chapter1.title: The Age of Peace
chapter1.p1: Long ago, the crescent island of Luna stood as a beacon of hope and prosperity. Its knights were legendary, its mages unmatched, and its people lived in harmony under the watchful gaze of the Council of Elders.
chapter1.p2: For centuries, Luna flourished. Trade routes connected the island to distant lands, bringing wealth and knowledge. The Academy of Mystic Arts trained generations of powerful sorcerers, while the Order of the Crescent Shield defended the realm from any who would threaten its peace.
chapter1.quote: "In those golden days, we believed nothing could break us. We were wrong."
chapter1.p3: But darkness was stirring in the shadows. In the forgotten depths beneath the island, an ancient power was awakening - one that would change the fate of Luna forever.

chapter2.label: Chapter Two
chapter2.title: The Chaos War
chapter2.p1: The arrival of Movarth, the King of Chaos, marked the end of Luna's golden age. With an army of corrupted souls and dark creatures, he swept across the island like a plague.
chapter2.p2: One by one, the great fortresses fell. The Order of the Crescent Shield fought valiantly, but they were no match for the overwhelming darkness. Within months, nearly half the island was consumed by chaos.
chapter2.quote: "When the King of Chaos smiled, even the bravest knights trembled."
chapter2.p3: All seemed lost. The Council of Elders had fallen, the Academy was in ruins, and hope was fading. But in the darkest hour, two unlikely heroes would emerge to turn the tide of war.

chapter3.label: Chapter Three
chapter3.title: The Two Masterminds
chapter3.p1: From the ashes of defeat rose Buddha Ban and the mysterious figure known only as The Mastermind. Where others saw only despair, they saw opportunity.
chapter3.p2: Through cunning strategy, forbidden alliances, and sacrifices that would haunt them for generations, they orchestrated a counter-offensive that would become legend. The Battle of the Crescent Moon lasted for three days and three nights.
chapter3.quote: "Victory was not won by strength alone, but by those willing to play the longest game."
chapter3.p3: When the dust settled, Movarth was sealed away in the depths from which he came. But the cost was immense. Luna would never be the same, and the two masterminds disappeared into legend, their true identities forever shrouded in mystery.

storyPage.moreChaptersDesc: The story of Luna is vast and ever-expanding. Join our Discord community to discover new chapters as they unfold.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Luna.

q1.question: What is Luna?
q1.answer: Luna is a massive, integrated fantasy world built on Discord. It features over 200 unique characters, rich lore spanning centuries, and a unique strategic card game called Luna Fantasy.

q2.question: How do I join the community?
q2.answer: Simply click the "Join Discord" button to access our Discord server. Once there, you can create your character and start your journey in the Luna universe.

q3.question: Is Luna free to play?
q3.answer: Yes! Luna is completely free to join and play. Simply join our Discord community and start your adventure.

q4.question: How does the card game work?
q4.answer: Each player holds 5 cards of different rarities (Common, Rare, Epic, Unique + 1 Random). The game is about strategy and predicting your opponent's moves. Higher tier doesn't always guarantee victory!

q5.question: Can I create my own character?
q5.answer: Absolutely! Our community encourages creativity. You can create original characters that fit within the Luna universe and participate in ongoing storylines.

q6.question: What languages are supported?
q6.answer: Luna supports both Arabic and English. Our website and community welcome players from all backgrounds.
